nodes.text: The Imperial Center Sanitation Department, also called Coruscant Sanitation, was a department on the planet Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Empire that was responsible for processing the massive amounts of waste. Waste was removed from the planet via transport mega-barges. Because the barges were rarely searched, the Sanitation Department was rife with corruption amongst its members, who took opportunities to make money on smuggling operations.
